title: MelodyCoin
author: MelodyCoin
content: Hai everyone, MelodyCoin here with a litle something lot of you asked for, needed and waited on:Complete Nand dumps of miner Control boards!       https://github.com/MelodyCoin/Miner-FirmwaresTo be used to unbrick miner with no sd card slot like most Innosilicon/DragonMint/Aladin G19 controller boards.Tested with Tl866ii+ , T48, T56 and DATAMAN 48 Pro2 programmers to work flawlessly, should work with any TSOP48 Nand programmer.Can also be used in case of original nand chip faillure on the controller to program replacement/new flash chip.For now, T2Ti and A10x are avaible on the git (more model of Innosilicon and BitMain miners to come in the following days, keep an eye open)Hope it will help as many people as possible.Melody
